== Sierra Wireless Aircard ==

'' Question '' : Can I use my Sierra Wireless modem on a Linux operating system ?

'' Answer '': 
https://sierrawireless.custhelp.com/app/answers/detail/a_id/500

'''**Note''':
Ubuntu 9.10 distribution is not supported with Sierra Wireless modems.
Ubuntu 9.04 distribution is still supported with all Sierra Wireless modems listed 
in this KB article.

We expect the issue to be fixed in Ubuntu 10.4.
